member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_RANGE
member.summary: Defines a range of vertices that are used when rendering less than the full contents of a vertex buffer.

member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_RANGE.startVertex
member.summary: The first vertex in the range to process.

member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_RANGE.vertexCount
member.summary: The number of vertices to use.
